cast.overview: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.
cast.title: Law Abiding Citizen

details.biography: Born in Philadelphia PA, Steve spent the first 14 years of his 25-year police career working undercover. He began his acting career in 2004 at the age of 54. He says, "I saw a film where an actor playing a cop sits in a diner slugging down donuts and coffee and I thought, 'Damn, that's not all that different from what I did as a real cop. Steve lives in southern New Jersey with wife, Debi and has two grown children - Christian and Shanna.
details.name: Steven J. Klaszky
